doltar lab tu chu khyen to/ khyim bdag de 'de bshan gshegs pas mtshan nyid shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ba da ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ la ste/ ban de bzhin gshegs pa'i

sprul pa shes pa dang bral ba ji snyid pa rin ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang mang tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to khyim bdag/
de la de pa ni gshegs pas mtshan nyid shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'-i lam shes pa bad ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na de bshan gshegs pa'i sprul pa thabs mkhas shing shes pa ji snyed nga
sku nyidin ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de pa gne gshegs pas mtshan nyid shes pa 'gogapar 'gyur ba'am shes pa dzasnying pa nyid kyang mang tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag
de la de bkan gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa shes pa 'di ltar lab tu mkhyen to 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na byams pa la gnas la shes pa dang/ snying
shu/ rje la gnas pa shes pa dang/ dga' ba la gnas pa shes ba dang/ btang snyoms la gnasabashesal ji snyad ba nyidi ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhani du de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i
gnas ba shes ba ja da ba nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdas de la de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas ba shes ba kun 'byung ba shes bcad ltar rab tu
mkhyen te/ bal ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na byams pa la gnas pa'i shes pa rtogs pa dang// snying rje la gnas ba'i nges pa rtogs pa dang/ dga' ba la gnas pa/shes pa
rtogs pa dang/ btang snyoms la gnos pa'i shes pa rtogs pa ji snyed ba nyidon mang tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas de bgan gshegs pa gnas pa shes pa kun 'byung la shes pa ji
snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsamadu de ltar rab tumkhyen to// khyim bdag de 'di banyani gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa shes ba 'gog ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste/
bar na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na shes pa 'gog pa ji snyed pa 'di na mang tsam ste/ de bzhin du de 'gan gshegs pas de bgan gshegs pa'i gnasal shes pa 'gog shes spyod pa nyid kyang
mang tsam du de ltar ba tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de bshAn gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa shes ba 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes la 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste/

bar na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rna laman thabs mkhas pa'i shes pa khong du chud pa ji spyod pa nyidi ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhenagshegs pa'i gnas shig ral yagab par 'gyuraga'/
lam shes ba ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po shas la da ltar ba tu mkhyen te gi
lta ste// dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na dad pa'i dbang po dang bral ba dang/ brtson 'grus dang/dran ngadang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ arab kyi dbang po dang bral/
badzra snyad pa nyid na ming tsam ste/ de ba gzhi du do ba ni gshegs pas de bgan gshegs pa'i debang bo shes pa ji snyed nga nyid kyang mang tsam du de ltar rab tumkhyen to// khyim bdag de la re

nga bgan gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dobang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shes ba 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na spyama'i skyes bu'i rmi laman nga rgya'agyashes pa la 'jug pa ji snyed pa

nyidi ni ming tsam ste/ de la lan du de la gzhi ga shegs pas de bzhan gdags pa'i dbang po shes pa kun 'byung dang shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang mang tsam du de ltar ba tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la
de brtan bshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po shis pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma skyes bu'i rnalem na nga rgyal lagang byed pa dang bralab
ji snyad ba nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de ba na du de ba ni bshags pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang shes pa bgog bshig pa ji snyed po nyid kyang gang tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag//
de la de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po shes ba 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lagshegs pa 'daltasarab tumkhyen te/ 'di lta ste/ par na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rnalam na lam rnyed pa
jisnyad gnyid na ming tsam ste/ de bshan du de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po shesal bgogapar 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to//
na/khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas lus kyi las shes pa 'di ltar ba tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste/ dbar na sgra'i skyes bu'i rmi laman lus skyod ba shes pa de bkani du/ de bgan
gshegs des lus kyi 'os shes pa ji snyid pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ga ba tumkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de brtani gshegs M pas lus kyi las shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te

'di lta ste/ dper na smyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na bya ba la 'jug pa ji snyid pa ri na ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de ba ni bshegs pas lus kyi lag shes pa kun 'byung ba shes ba stong pa nyid kyang ming
tsam du da ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas lus kyi las dgos pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi leman til
mar gyi mar medusalazad cung la shes pa snying la de ni mong tsag ste/ de bzhin du de bde gshegs pas lus kyi las shes pa 'gog shes pa ji snyid pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tumkhyen to//
khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas lus kyi lag shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tumakhyan to/ bdalta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'askyes bu'i rmo 'am na lus kyi las yongasau
shes pa ji snyed pa de ni blo ste/ de bzhin du de bkani gshegs pas lus kyi las shes pa 'go ga bar 'gyur ba'i 'gashes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang mnge tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to//
khyim bdag de la de banyani gshegs pas ngag gi las shesar 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'a rmi lam na brdzun du smra ba 'cha/ brdzun du smra b.las
ldog pa 'am/ phru ma'i drag gam/ phu ma'i galas ldog pa ma/ tshig rtsu pa po'i ngag gam/ tshig rtsub po'i ngos las ldog pa ma/ tsog bkyal pa 'amaM/ tshigabakyal pa lasoldogal ji snyed
pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de la zhan du de bzhin gshegs pas ngag gi las shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas ngag gi las shes pa

ba kun 'byung ba shes pa 'ad ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i tshilaman tshad mas bstan pa shes ba ji snyed pa nyid na ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bain gshegs pas ngag gi

las pags pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyid ra nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas ngag gi lasashes nga 'gog pa shes nga 'di ltar rab tumkhyen te/ 'di

sgo lta ste/ dper na sbyama'i skyes bu'i rmi laman ngag gi las shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid na ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas ngagagi las shes pa 'gog pa shes pa nga steng pa nyid
kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas ngag gi las shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes/

bu'i mi lam na/ zos ba dang thos pa yongs su shes pa ji snyed pa nyid na ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas ngag ga las shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lamashes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam
du de ltar bu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas yid kyi las shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu ba rmi lam na bar snang la
ri mo 'dra ba ji snyid pa nyid na mong maste/ du ba ni du de ba ni gshegs pas de kyi lasags pa dusnyid nga nyid kyang mang tsam du de ltar 'batumkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas

yid kyi las shes pa kun 'byung ba shes ba 'di ltar 'ab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu tsho'i mna' mi 'di pa'i ba bro shes pa ji snyed pa nyid na ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin
gshegs pa nas/ de bkan du sbyar te/ ming tsam gyi bar du'o khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas yid kyi las shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tumkhyen te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na skya

ma'i sbyin bu'i rmi lam na ri mo 'dra de 'i bskal pa shes pa ji snyid pa nyidi ni ming tsam ste/ de kha gan du de bzhin gshegs pa nas/ de bgan du sbyar te/ mngetsam gyi bar du'o// khyim bdag de la de bzhin
gshegs pas yid kyi las shes pa 'go ga par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste/ dparan sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na slobadapon
gyis bstan pa ji snyed pa 'di na menge tsum ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas yid kyi las shes pa bgrog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes ba dzasnyad pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu
kham po bcu gcig pa////mkhadrag de la de ba'i nagshegs pas sngon du 'gro ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta

ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi laman sngon du mgyogs pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste ( de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas sngon du 'gro kha shas ba ji snyid kha nyid kyang ang tshab du de ltar rab tu
mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de bkAn gshegs pas sngon du 'gro ba shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa bad ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di ltasta dpan sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rna laman phyogs dag tu dono
gyi bsam pa ji snyid pa 'di ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhi du de bzhinagshegs pas sngon du 'gro bu shes pa kun 'byung ba shes ba de med pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de
lare bzhin bshegs pas sngon du 'gro ba shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i latshan sngon du mgyogs pa shi kho ji snyed pa 'di ni mang
pa0 tsag ste/ deng zhan du de bgani gshegs bas sngon du 'gro ba shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de lta ba ta mkhyen to// khyim pa dag de la de bzhin gshegs pas
sngon du 'gro kha shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba 'amashes ga bar ltar rab tum kun te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na phyogs dag tu don grub pa shes pa ji snyid pa nyidi ni mang
tsam ste/ de shan du de bkan gshegs pas sngon du 'gro ba shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'akhem shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang bde tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim
bdag de la de ba ni gshegs bas rjes su 'jug pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tumkhyen te/ 'ju lta ste// dper na rmi lam na rnam par sad par byed pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de
bgazhi du de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su 'jug pa shes pa ji snyid pa nyid kyang mang tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ khyim bdag de la de bgan gshegs pas rjes su 'jug shes pa kun 'byung
ba shes bu 'di ltar ba tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste/ bar na sgyu ma 'byas bu'i rmi lam na rnam ra bad pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid na 'di tsam ste/ de ba han du de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su
'jug pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes ba ji snyed pa nyid kyang mang tsam du ri ltar rab tumkhyen to/ khyim bdag del de bzhan gshegs pas rjes su 'jug pa shesapa 'gog/shes pa 'ad ltar
bya// rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi laman mashib ji snyed ba nyidi na mang tsam ste/ de bzhan du de bkan gshegs pas rjes su 'jug pashes pa/
'gog bshes baji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsamadu de ltar ka ba tu mkhyen to//khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su 'jug ba shes ba 'gag par 'gyur ba'i lag shes pa 'di ltar ba tu mkhyen
te Da 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rno leman mi mthun pa'i rtsa ba yang dag par bcad pa ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ mang tsam gyi bar
du'o khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su mi nyams ra shes pa bde la ra ba tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu mi lam na dug 'thungs pa'i rtse

sman ma lus par byed pa ji snyed pa nyid na ming tsam ste/ de bzhan du de bshanagshegs pas yongs su mi nyags bshes ba ji snyid pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de
bkazhi gshegs pas yongs sum nyams la shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltagarab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste/ dperan sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi laman dug byin pa la dug bsal ba 'tshol ba ji snyed ba nyid

ko ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su ma nyams pa shes ba kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang yid tsam du de ltar 'ab tu mkhyen to// khyi'i bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas
00 yongs su mnyam pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa da ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ bad lta ste/ dper na smyug skyes bu'i rnaman rtogamakhyung ba ji snyed pa 'di na de tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhani gshegs bas
yongs su mi nyam pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang mang tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ mi bdag de la de ba 'di ga shegs pas yongs sul nyem pa shes ba 'gog par 'gyur ba'am shes

pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na spyama'i rmi lam na dug byin pa la yang dag pa'i gso ba'i dpyad byed pa ji snyed pa nyidi ni gong tsam ste/ de bgane du de bahan gshegs pas yongs su me
nyam pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i 'tsha shes pa ji snyedapa nyid kyang mang tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyi'i bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shes pa 'di ltar
rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na smyama'i skyes bu'i rma'i man rtsi sman mkhan nad la mkhas pa dang/ nad kun nas ldang ba la mkhas pa dang/ nad pa' ke khams lam gas pa dang/ sman sbyor ba/
la mkhas pa dang/ kha zasakyi cho ga la mkhas pa dang/ khrus kyi rnyog lam khas pa dang/ bsku mnye'i cho ga la mkhas pa dang/ rkang pas mnye ba'i rtog la mkhas pa dang/ lag pas mnye ba'i
cho ga la mkhas pa dang/ nyal ba'i tshig lamakhas pa dang/ sad ba'ichogal mkhas pa dang/ longs spyod kun gyi cho ga la mkhas pa dang/ dpyad kyi sbyorab 'jug pa la mkhas pa dang/ dusashes
tshod shes/ dus mnashes nga/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rtsi sman dag gsanarawams cud bajogs bzhes pa ji snyed pa/nyid ni khongatsan sku/ de ba na du de bzhin/
gshegs pas thams cad mkhyen pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam dude ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad mkhyen pa shes ba kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di
ltar 'ab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mo 'oman sprul ba 'gasopa'i dpyad shes pa ji snyid pa nyid ni mong tsam ste/ de bzhin du de la na gshegs pas thams cad mkhyen
lta bshes kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tumakhyon te/ khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad mkhyen ba shesal 'gos pa shes pa 'di lta ba tu
man te/ 'di lta ste dpal na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i lam na nad thams cad rab tu 'bar byed pa shes pa ji snyed pa 'di ni ming tsam ste/de bzhan du de ba gne gshegs pas thams cad mkhyen pa
shes pa 'gog pa shes pa snyad pa nyid kyang mingatsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad mkhyen pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lanangashes pa
'di ltar 'ar tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na smyama'i skyes bu'i lamanagaso ba'i dpyad ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bkan du de ba gni gshegs pas thams cad mkhyenang shes pa
'gog par 'gyur ba'am shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang mang tsam du de ltar 'gatumkhyen to// khyim bdag de lta bas na 'dir gang gi ye shes mthong ba thegs ba med dor 'jug pa// gzhan gyis
bstana'ang/ gzhan la rag ma las bab shes pas sems can rnams la phan gad gas pa'i don du bdag nyidi mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyus pa de ni/ tsan dan gyi khyams dang khang ba zangs
'di la longs spyod na rgyu'o// de skad ces smras pa dang/ khyim bdag phu mkhan gyis/ lagagabla tshe dang ldan pa gang po la 'di skad ces smras so// gang bo bcom ldan
badras de da ltar gang na bzhugs/ de skad ces smras khadang/ lag gi khru gang pos/ khyim bdag phu mkhan la 'di skad ces smras so// khyim bdag byang phyogs 'dogasan/ kos 2zhes bya
bab yul gyi ldes yod de/ gangs ra'i rgyal po'i byungan/ nyan yod ces bya ba grong khyer chen po de na/ rgyal bu gzhon nu rgyalabu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin kun dga' ra ba na/
bcom ldan 'dasade da ltar bzhugs so// de skad ces smras ba dang/ khyim bdag phya mkhan gyis/ lag gab tshe dang ldan pa gang go la 'di skad gasmag go// gang po mnyan yodakyi grong khyen
chen po 'di nas rang khyad ji tsamaM/ smras pa// khyim bdag de dpag tshad sum stong drug cu rtsakha' yod do// de skad ces smras pa dang/ khyim bdag bu mkhan gyis/ lag gi bu tshe dang ldan pa/
gang bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ gang bo'angeb de nas bcom ldan 'das de ji srid go gis yin/ smras pa/ khyi'i bdag de bzhin gshegs pa 'ani ring la
mnye ba med de/ khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das dobazhedan/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ grangs med pa bgad+hAwikrung gi bye ma snyed las lhag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams khrag
shi khrig dag tu gshegs go/ khyi'i bdag 'dal de bzhin gshegs lus sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa dag mkhyen/ shin tu nan/ na tu gzigs/ shin tu thugs su chud/
shin tu mngon sum du mdzad de/ mig btsums pa tsam gyis/ sems can thams cad kyi sams dang spyodab dgarab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de bzhin gshegs pa de med na/ sem
can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i blo nyo bar gzhag nas/ 'gig rten gyi khams khrag khrig dag tul/shegs so// gang bo bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su gzung ba'i ni/ debagan gshegs
pa de la khrus bzang po la nye bar spyan drangasan gshegs sam/ khyim bdag gal te cung zad yongs su gtong ba lcan/ de bkan gshegs pa de shel brasagatsang ma la spyan drongs shig dang/
khyod kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su gzung ba'i phyi'i/ bcom ldan 'das de nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas par gshigasaso// de nas khyim bdag khya mkhan gyis tshe dang ldan kha
gang po'i ltar tshanyan nas/ me tog dang/ 'byung ba dang/ bdug ba dag blangs te/ tsan dan gyi khyams dang ga ba ngab zangs kyi steng du 'dzegs nas// me tog gis brgyan/ spos kyis byugs nas/
bcom ldan 'das de phyogs gang legs na bzhugs pa der phyogs nas/ gos khug pa gcig tugazar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa labatsugs nas/ thal mo sbyar te bde skad ces gsol to//
bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba nye bar dgongs te/ 'khras bathang bo de lade bzhin gshags pa dgra bcom pa yang dgakhar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dgoslong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu
gshegs par caganang/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshalanabazhugs la mi las 'das pa'i lha'i snyan rnam par dag pa'i khams kyis/ khyim bdag phywa mkhan gyis spyan drangs bgasan nas
gshegs par gnang ngo// de nas khyig bdag bya mkhan gyis/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par spyan drangs te// bran dang/ las byed pa dang/ lo shas 'tsho ba dang/ mdza' bshes
dang/ nye du dang/ snag gi gnyen mtshams dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ khyed cag nyon cig/ ngas bcom ldan 'das de bzhan gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
de na thos kyi deg 'dun dang bcas pa'i zhal khras bzang bo la spyan drangasakyis/ de la khyed kyis nus pa yod pa dang/ mthu ru yid bab lus kyis zhal ta bya ba la brtson pa dang ldan bgyis
shagi/ khyim bdag phya mkhan gyis de skad ces smras pa dang/ mdzab bshes dang/ nye du dang/ snag ga ba nyen mtshams dang/ sngon po dang/ bran mo dang/ las
byed pa dang/ logs 'tsho ba dag gis/ khyim bdag phu ma ban la 'di skad ces smras so//khyim bdag smyos so//khyim bdag ga le sogang tsha ldan 'das de la mthong bar zhal gras babang po la spyan 'dren/
'go tam/khyim bdug phu mkhan gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de spyan 'dren zhes sus gsol// de skad ces smras pa dang/ khyim bdag bu ma ban gyis/ mdza' bshes dang/ blon po dang/ nye
ny+tsadudang/ snag ga ge rten mtshams dang/ bran po dang/ bran mo dang/ las lung pa dang/ khong nas 'tshog drag la bde skad ces smras so/ grogs po dag bcom ldan 'das de sangs rgyas kyi
yon tan dpag med pa dag brnyes te/ des n ngab sems mkhyen nas gnang gro/ de dgamagu tang dga' la yarengs pa dang/ rab tu dga' zhing bde ba dang/ yid bde ba bskyod nas/
[কমবষযথাঘবকহহবধুমমেঠবষযহােব! ]/ de nas btsem ldan 'das de phyi 'bod kyi dus su nang du yang dag 'jog las bshangasanas/
smig lab ldum bu'i 'khor gyi mas ga la ba der gshegs so// de'am smyug ma'i lhumakhu cor gyi khyams na/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang/ dge slong rab tu mang po dag dang lhan cig tu 'dus
nas khod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo song la mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po na dge slong nye bar
gnas shing 'khod nga ja spyod pa de dag thams cad ma gro'i gnas su 'dus nas/ nga la sgron ga/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de ltar 'tshal zhes/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ mnyan
yod kyi grong khyer chen pon dge slong nye bar gnas pa nga 'khod pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rim gro'i gnas su 'dus nas/ com ldan 'das ga la bzhugs pa der song ste khyon nas/ bcom ldan 'das
la gsol// bcom ldan 'das ma nyen yod kyi grong khyer chen go na da ge slong nye bar gnas pa'i mchis pa de dag thams cad rim gro'i gnas su 'dus lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i dus la da bab
de nas bcom ldan 'das zhi gro'i gnas ga la ba der gshegs nas/ gdan bcas pa de la bzhugs so/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong de dag
la bka' stsal ba/ dge slong dag grong khyechen po dag bal rol 'gron/ khyim bdag phya mkhan gyis sangs rgyas dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la sogs pa mngon par spyan drangasate/ de
sa gnang gis/ de'abyor dgeslong gang dag rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa de dag gis tshulang long ldig/ de'i tshe na der dge slong lnga brgya ba dge 'dun gang dag giso tshul shing blangs so// de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong dag la bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag rdzu 'phrul gyi bzul ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis sems can dag tshang dag par na ga 'bar bya ba'i
ni/ naman khag lam las 'dong bar gyis shig bcom ldan bdag legs so shos gsol te/ dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi lta mnyan to/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
zla deb mtshan mo 'das nas/ nang par sdur chos gos dang smad g.yogs gsol/ lhung bzed bsnams te/ sgyu lu rgyal byed kyi tshal nas nam mkha' la mngon par 'bab/sa te/ grong khyer chen

chu bo dag nga ba pha rol 'gro ga la ba der gshegs so// tshe dang ldan ba shing shun nyin rgyal po'i khab na drang srong ga'i ngos 'a snga dang/ shing pib pa la skyo ba na 'dug la khagyi cha stod dang cha smad
la mi nyal bar rnal 'byor la brtson te/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dag bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson 'ang gnas dang lhag mthong la mngon par brtson pa 'chag
lhacing 'gro ba deg/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabasi tu nam mkha'i lam nas gshegs pa mthong ste/ 'di lta ste/ bar na ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar mthong nas/ bcom ldan
'das ga la ba de legs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal gang 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shing shun can labaka' stsalang/ shing
shunacan tshun shog de nas tshe dang ldan pa shing shunacan/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal bar gnas/ lus dang srog la ma bltas bar ngam grogadang g.yang sa de la bdag nyid mtshosas/
da bar snang lasong ma thag tu mngon pa shes pa drug mngon sumadubyas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dang/ shing shun can dang/ dgra bcom pa lnga brgya tshang bar thabs cig tu grong khyer
chen po dge ba'i pha rol 'grog la ba der gshegs so// de nas dge slong de dag rdzu 'phrul gyi 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis tsan dan gyi khyams dang khang bsangs dor mngon par
grus/sa te/ la la ni seng ge 'i gzugs/ la lan stag gi'o/zugs/ la la ni glang po che'i gzugs/ la lanirta' gzugs/ la la ni khyakhachog gi gabrugs/ la la na klu'i gzugs/
la la ni nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po'i gzugs/ la la ni 'khor los sgyur ba rgyal po'i gzugs/ la la ni blon po'i gzugs/ la la ni dge slong nang ga gzugs/ la la na lus las ra
sngon po dag rab tu 'byin/ la lanu dkar po/ la la ni de kar/ la lan lus las 'od pa tsed ka dag rab tu 'byin/ lal nA char 'bebs/ la la na rlung rab tu gtongo/ la la ni nir
gyi char rab tu 'bobs/ la la nagaser gyi char 'ab tu babs/ la' ni dngul gyi char rab tu 'bebs la lan spos chu'i char 'ab tu 'babs/ la lan sa la bu bsil bar rab tu gtong/ la la ni
[©]// brag pa 'khyen/ la lani rgya mtsho chen por chu 'bab pa khyer/ la la ning rta la kon/ gal ni grung de tsho'i shing rta la nyon/ la la ni rta'i shing rta la zhon/ la las ni

klubashing rta mngon par sprul/ la lasan grul bum seng rta mngon par sprul/ la las ni gnod sbyin gyi dpe rta mngon par sprul/ la las ni dri za ba dang rta mngon par sprul/ la 'as na tshe 'phuladas zu/
tsha du sbrul la lasani 'od g gi lus 'as tsho 'bar/ la lasan bdag gi lus las chu 'dzag lta/ de dag la sogs pa rdzu 'phrul gyi 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan dag gis kyang/ nadan
gyi khyogs dang khang bzangs su mngon par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das na bdag nyid kyi dao po bzung bas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis na yang dag par brgyan/ dpe byad babrangale/
pa brgyad cusan rnamang ra pas/ mdzes shing dang ba dang dbang po ne'i/ shugs ni kaM/ dul ba dang rke gnas dam pa ni brnyas/ dul ba dang ka'o/nas mchog gi pha rol tu na phyin mi mjed kyi bdag
po tshangs pa dang/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang/ rgyal po chen pa dang/ gnas kha tsang ma'is kyi lha du stong dag gisani phyag byas/ bdud rtsi'i char gyi rgyunarab tu 'bar shing mchod pa dang/
me tog mnad ra ba'i charab zhes shing/ tsan dan gyi khams dang khang ba'angs su mngon par gshegs te/ dolta bas na bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang chabs cig tu sems can dag mang dag khar

dag 'bar mdzad cing/ tsan dan gyi khyams dang sa khang bzangs su mngon par gshegs so// dge ba'i ba rol 'gro ba'i bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu
ra snang las gshegs pa mthong ste/ 'di lta ste// dper na ngang pa'i rgyal po chen po lta bur mthong nas/ srog chags khri dgachos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral te rnam par
ngag go/ gang drag sngon gyi sa sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la spyad pa'i grog chugs khri dag gsan/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe 'bul mthong nasaM/ byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ de
dag byang chub tu sems bskyed ma thag tu skye ba'i chos la bzod pa tho bo// sngon bsam bskyod pa'i srog chags 'dag gis ni byang chub tu sems bskyed do// nyan thos dag gis 'dul ba'i srog

chagos brgyad khri de dag nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrula mthong nas/ chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral te rnam par dag go/ lha khri dag gsan po rtsom ldan 'das kyi rje 'al mtheng nas/

chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral te rnam par dag go/ ga khrugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu khri dag gse na chos rnams la chos kyi ge rdul med cing dri ma dang bral te rnam par dag pa nas/
phyir ma 'ongaba'i 'bras bu thob pa'i bar du gyur to// de nas lha rnams kyi dpang po brgya byan gyis ] za'i rgyal bo gtsug bud lnga pa la smras pa/ gtsug bud lnga pa de ba ga gshag
dab la bkur stigyig gi/ de wa'i rgyal po bu gtsug phud lnga pas de ltar 'tshal lo/ zhes lhab dbang po brgya byin gyi ltas an te/ drakhris ya phrag dug dag dang lhan cig
tu rgyud kyi dbyangs dang/ grub dbyangs kyis de pa ni gshegs pa la bkur sti byed do// rol mesesgra dang/ glu sgra de dag gso/ rgyu mtshan ngo Ti klu'i rgyal po do dag rab tu dga' zhing bde ba dang/
yid bde ba skyes nas rang rang gi gnas nas byung// de dag byung bas rgya mtsho chen po na 'byung po chen po dag ga gnas rnam par ba khrugs so// klub rgyal bo mdzes ba lasogs pa klu dung 'jug brgyad
dag bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyi'i rgya mtsho chen po nas bskyod do klu'i rgyal po lha mdzes la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgudagabcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang/ phyag bya ba dang/ bsnyen bkus/

bya ba'i phyi'i bskyod do// klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la sogs pa klu dung phyur phyag dgu dag bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyi'i rgya mtsho chen po nas bskyod do/ klub rgyal po gsor gtsug la sogs pa klu dung phyur
brag dgudag bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir bskyod de/ klu'i rgyal po ut+pa la'i chog la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dag bcom ldan 'das pa lta ba'i phyi'i bskyod de// klu'i rgyal po dga' bo la
sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ thams cad la yang bya'o// klu'i rgyal bo nyi dag la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang/ klu'i rgyal bo ma dros pa la sogs pa klu dung
thur khrag dgu dang/ klu'i rgyal po ga'i rab tshal sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang/ klu'i rgyal po ba pa'i bu la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgudang klu'i rgyal po ma'i nag pa la
sogs pa dung phyur phrag dgu dang klu'i rgyal po go'u ta ma la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgudang/ klu'i rgyalalo/ kam pa la la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgudang/ klu'i rgya kha po tshul

'kher sgrung la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang/ klu'irgyal po mgrinasngon la sogs ba ku dung phyur phrag dgu dang/ klu'i rgyal bo gsar mgrin la sogaso ba klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang/ klu'i rgyal
de 'jigs sgrogs la sogs pa kladu byur phrag dgudang/ klu'i rgyalapo gzican la sogs pa klu dung phyur brag r gu dang/ klu'i rgyal po rnam par snang byed 'gas da dung phyur phrag dgu
dang Da klu'i rgyal bo rdul bral sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgunas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ klu'i rgyal po'i do chen la sogs pa dang/ klu rgyal bo rab tu gdung byed la sogs pa dang/ klu'i rgyal
po stobs chen la sogs pa dang/ klu'i rgyal po smanetshon la sogs pa dang/ klu'i rgyal po zlachen la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang/ klu yang dag par ston pa la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu
dang/ klu'i rgyal po shugs 'dzin la sogs pa klung phyur phrag dgu dang/ klu'i rgyal po niche la sogs pa dang/ klu'i rgyal po rab tu gdul dka' ba la sogs pa dang/ klu'i rgyal po thams
cad ma 'dra zhes bya ba klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang/ klu'i rgyal bo chen spyod pa la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dog bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyi'i rgya mtsho chen po nas
bskyod de/ de dag la sogs pa klu phul khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa dag gzhan dag dang/ la khor dung phyur phrag dag tu dge bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i byin rgyu mtshonapo nas bskyod do//
de dag gis rgya mtsho chen po du krugs so/ dge slong de dag gis kyang grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ tshod dus dang/ ri boras dang bcas ba dkrugs so/ de nas rnam pa du mar g.yosaM/ kha
tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul/ rang tu bgul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg rab tu ldeg kun tu rab tu ldeg go/ de nas khyim bdag bya mkhan gyis/
sangs rgyas la sogs pa dag slong gi dge 'dun la bza' ba dang/ b.rul ba dang/ rkyang ba bzang zhing pa ta mang rang gi lag gis yang dag par tshim par byas shing yang dag par khrims so//
de nas bangom ldan 'das kyiso/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag su'i de sod snyoms kyang yongs su bza' bar 'byaste/ grong khyer chen po dge ba'il ro' 'gro 'di klu 'khrug
bdag gis grong khyer ma rus par byas sa re/ de nas bcom ldan 'das bsod snyoms bzhes nas/ nam ma bab la mngon par 'phags te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na ngang pa'i rgyal bo chen po
bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dunaphyir bkyanas/ gnus su sprulapa brgya stong phrag dpag tu med pa dag mngon par sprul te/ des klu'i rgyal po gang dag bcom
ldan 'das lta bar 'dod pa de dag la/ daha na gshegs pa'i sbrulaM pa mngon par sprulato// klu'i rgyal po gang dgabcom ldan das la ma dad cing ltakhar mi 'dod pa de dag yongs su smin par bya ba'i

don du/ gsar bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dbag tu med pa daMg mngon par sbrul to// der klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dpag tumed pa dag mi skyob chos lakhazod pa thob bo// klu bye la

khrag khrig dang gtu med pa dag ni sangs rgyas la dad pa skyes so// de dag dad pa thobim thag tu klu'i skyi gnas de na sha ste/ bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skyes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
kru bye ba khrag khrig dang gtumad pa de dag b.lanasabasod snyoms bzhes te bar snang las gshegs so// deb tshin la lag pa ltar mnyam pa na/ dkab thub can mes byin zhes
byab 'ge gnas te/ de bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i 'od snang las gshegs pa mthong ngo// des mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'dasal shin tu gus pa'i skyed nas// ma ldan 'das la 'di skad/
ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la mtshan ma'i rnam pa de bshan du mdzad du gsol// gang bdagags gnas bde'i bzhugs na mchod par bgyi'o// des ba[W]ldan 'das kyis rol na
thubya// mas byin gyi bsam pa shugasasu chud nas// skyob phyi ma dag nyid la thugs brtse ba'i slad du rdo yis lazhabs pa gag go de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ ral ba can zhes
phyin la 'di skor sa bkab la lnga/ wumazakhyadabyas ms sbyab gda' nas gnas
byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bram ze khyod kyi sogs dud par byuba'i don du 'di ni mchod rten no/ nga/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa tsho'u 'gal gyi bu chen po
kyi ltar mnyan nas/ klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa'i gnas kyi chu 'gram du bzhugs so// de nas klu'i rgyal bo ma dros bas/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gshegs
ba'i bu ga nas/ gser dang/ dngul dang/ bye ma dang/ shel dang/ mu tig dmar bo dang/ spug ga snying po dang/ rdo'i snying po rin po che sna bdun las byus ba'i stan lnga brgya tsam zhig
mngon bar sprul to// khri stan lnga brgya de dag gdabusaMsu bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan sa ni kho tsho sna bdun las byas pa gdan bshams te/ klu'adis bcos bus g.yogs so// de nas klu'i
rgyal po ma dros pa klu'i bu mo'i 'khor dang// bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du song de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la zan khros shing/ lhung
bzed dung lag pa bkrus par thugs su chud nas bka' stsal la// mo'u 'gal gyi bu song la/ gnas brtan shA ra'i bu khyod ston pa 'bod do zhes smos shig/ bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol/
te/ tshudang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ 'di lta ste/ dubar na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa brkyang pa'i m/ brkyang ba bskum pa de la

du/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po mdzes pa'i mtshonas byung ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i mdun du 'dug go/ de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu snam sbyar 'drub par

gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po// tshe dang ldan pa shAri'i bu dang lhan cig tu yang dag bar dga' ba'i gtam dang/ gtam snyan pa rnam pa mang bo byas nas/ tshe dang ldan pa/

ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// ston ba ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khyed la 'bod de/ ston pa khyod la mngon par dgyes kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i khu tshur shog/ ston pa khyod lagasung gis

'dong/ de skad ces smras pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po re ka'i snam sbyar 'di
bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'di nyi byed/ smras pa// snam sbyar btsem par bya ba 'di myur du btsem par bya'o// smras pa//
dub pa dang win pa nyid du gyis shig/ de de ma thag tu drubs shing zin pa nyid du byas nas/ smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshur shog/ da 'dong/ smras pa/ mi 'gro// stsas pa//
gal te khyod ma 'gro na stobasakyis bkur ro// smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu re khag ska rags 'di stobs kyis khyer nus dang/ nga stobs kyis khyer bar shesaso// des ska rags de 'jig
rten gyi khams bdun du byani gyisabarlabs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bus/ ska rags de rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyisobatog pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'o 'jig rten khams 'di
thogayos kyang ska ragasade gdeg par ma nus so// de nas ma dros pa'i mtsho rlabs shin tu g.yos so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa lta thul gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//
bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du dog sa chen po g.yos pa byung ba 'di rgyu gang lags/ skyon gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rta shul la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
to nyan thos chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu la 'ad skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa mo 'gal gyi
jeg dacig/ bdag kyang mchi'o// de skad ces smras nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gtsug tu 'dug go/ tshe
dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ni phyi nas 'ong po/ medang ldan pa shA ra'i bu mngon du phyogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul thob bas/ de dang por bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song nas bdugago
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan mde lta bu byung ba mdzad pa'i mtshan ma ji lta bu byung ba mdzad pasaM/ rgya mtsho'i klu'i rgyal po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug
go de nas bcom ldan 'das la/klu'i rgyal po mdzes dgas 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye nA/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la bdag
phyogs 'gab tshig zhu'o// bka' stsal pa/ mdzes dga' ngas khul la lung bstan pa'i phyir 'di ltar thams cad skabs dbye bar bya'o// tshigs su bcad pa/ ston pa bde sbyin mdzad la zhu ba ni/
sbyad pa spyod tshe sug las su bgyis dang// bde ba'i lam gyis mya ngan 'dras reg pa// bde gshegs sbyin mdzad de na lung bstan gsol// ma dros klu yis 'jig rten mgon de la// zhus pa bde bar
gshegs pas lung bstan// dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bus yang bong dang/ gang gi gabade bar gshegs pa bskyed// sngon gyi srid par spyad pa spyod nga 'i tshe// skye bo thams cad bde bas bde ldan byas
de yis legs babs de byas pas na/ khad pa'i lam gyis mya ngan 'das reg 'gyur// ston pa ba le sung gis mdzes pa de dag ba nas/ de las skad cig sa steng bus/
btsugs te// gzhal meda dga'abab sems ni dang bas su// 'jig rten sgronam 'dren la phyag 'tshalakhyed// ston pa blo yis ma bsal phyag 'tshal ko/ 'gro ba kun las nges 'byung phyag
'tshol la// 'gags med blo dag pa la phyag 'tshal la/ bde gshegs gzhan men gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas klu'i rgyal po lha mdzes kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la
sgyu tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis lus kha bod mdzad spyan sdug legs pa'i spyan mnga' ba/ blo dag nyon mongs tshogs las rnam grol zhing/ ye shes dri med spyod lul khyod la ni// spyad pa spyod
tsho rnam thar mdazhu/ lha dang bcas pa 'jig rten sman slad du/ jiltar sbyar na byung chub ka ba tshal snang/ mi mchog dam pa dag gi spyod sbyong dag yid 'das de dag bdag la bka' 'gasol//
rgyal ba de yi rdzu la bcom dbang po bsdams// 'dod pa'i 'ching las thul san rnam grol ba' dgongs pas de nyid sems kyi rjes 'jug pa// thugs rigs la dkrugs des na lung bstan pa// mkhas pas
yi[%/ ]dge ba dag ni spyad pa lo'i/ srog gi phyir yang di ni mi ldog cing/ rtag tu spyod che nyin mongs med yid kyis// lus dang ngag gis dge ba mnyam spyod pa// de yis legs pa'i las de khyus na
la bor pa 'gro la spyod pa rnam dag ste// tshulanang nas pad ma skyob ltar/ gos pa med cing byang chub yang dag 'grub// bde gshegs gsung gis lha yi mdzes pa klu// de ni dga' [”]nga legs par ma
bag su// de yis skad yig la dus btsugs te/ sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog la phyag 'tshal byed// thub pa 'jig rten gsum la smon mdzad pa// blo gros nges par rigs la phyag 'tshal 'go/ spyad
ba spyod mi khyod kyi rjes slob cing// byang chub mi g.yo de ni bskyed par bgyi/ sems can don du spyad paspyod pa tsho// lus dang srogazhi dri ba na btang nas su// sdug bsngal thar byed sangs rgyas
'gyur ba dang/ byang chub ki ba bla med thob par bgyi/ klu de'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas su// rgyalab dgu las rgyal la 'dzum mdzad de// de tshe ji ltar@#/pa'i bye snyed kyi// sangs rgyas mtha'
yas zhingan 'od kyis byug/ bde bar gshegs pas 'dzum pa bstan pa la// nam mkha'i lhas rig legs so gas gsol to// e mabo rgyal pas rdula'anyimadabang po bsgoms// khyed dad
mnyam med gong na yod ma yin// sangs rgyas de mang dag ni ba g.yos shing/ 'dod ba'i lhazhisdur na shin tu rmos/ lha tshogs mang po bsam pa rab dga' dang/ rgyal ba dbang po thul/
'phug 'tshal byed// ston pa'i nyan thes rdzu 'phrul che ba'i mchog/ mo'u 'gal bu yis rgyal yongs lus ba// gang gis dpag tu med pa'i dzum mdzad pa/ bcom ldan bde gshegs rgyu
gang rkyen gang lags// mo'u 'gal bu yis rgyu la 'anyer zhus pa// rtsom gcod mdzad rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/ nga la mchod pa byed pa'i klu 'di ni// ma 'ongs pa
ma dus na sangs rgyas gyug/ ji snyed ka nga 'ad 'od kyis khyab pa dag/ de dag thams cad rgyal ba'i dri ba nug bsgyur/ des na rgyal ba 'di ltar 'gyur ba ste// 'dren pa de ba mang dbang po'i rgyal
! mtshan// srog chags bye ba khrag khrige mtha' yas dag des ni 'gro skyod la rol 'grol byed de/ ba la brten nas ngas ni 'dzum pa bstan/ mo'u 'gal bu khyod de ltar shes par gyiso// klu de/
lung bstan pa ni thos nas su// bla na med pa dag la dga' pas khyab/ lung bstan thos nas bar snang ba da'i sa na// ta la brgyad cu'i srid du mngon par 'phags// phyogs bcu dag na rnam dag rgyal ba'i
[']zhing// bzang la grangs med gangs rgyas des mthong ste/ d mthong nas sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog dag la// tshigs bcad snatshogs dag gso rgyal la bstod// 'gro la phan skyed rgyal ba dgra las
gyol/ dbang po thul cing ma nor de ba gan gsung// 'od mdzad bde gsung khyod la phyag 'tshal la/ bde gshegs mi rmongs med la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas klu'i rgyal po gam
po/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ 'bos sel sngangs grol khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// spyod pa spyod tsho sug las ci bgyis pas// 'jigs las grol dang 'gro la pa
thar bgyid pa// 'jigs sel lam zhugs dag la bkagastsal gsol// ji ltar 'dren pa bdag labaka' stsal gsol// ji ltar 'dren pa bdag nyid 'jigs grol zhing// skye bebaji
lasa'ab tu grol mdzad pa// khyod kyis legs par gsungs ba'i bkab thos nas// de bzhin ngoms med yid kyis spyad par bgyi/ chu chen 'dzinib klu yi rgya mtsho ris/ 'gro la phan zhi/
ston la zhu byed pa// 'gis bcas zhes r bcas pa'i ng de brten nas// mi dbang spyan sngar zhe sar bcas pas 'dug/ de la bsam ba 'dren pasazugs chud nas// ji ltar spyad na 'jigs
dang rnam bral zhing// sems can dag kyang 'jigs las wa'abyed pa/ man ngag brgyad ldan gsung gis lung bstan to// byang chub spyad pa rjes su spyod bya shing/ dbyug mtshon
med pas 'gro la 'ab tu ston// chu dang thang dang de bzhin g.yul 'thab pagi/ 'jigs la yang dang yang du 'jigs med sbyi/ de yis legs pa'i las na byas pas ni// ngag
pa'i m 'gro byung chub reg gyur la// mnyam par gtag pa'i byams pa'i rigs kyis su// zhitu ma bgrad bdud stobasarob skrag byed// stobs bcu'i mkhyen pos rgya mtsho de dga'
nas// de yi skad cig sa la pus btsugs te// 'jigs ban ma nas ka kha'i 'bab 'dug nas// bde bar gshegs la thal sbyar thul/ 'tshalakhyed// sudi kun dag la ma gnas phyag 'tshal
bya// la snang med 'jigs bral ldan la phyag 'tshal le// sdang dang 'jigs las skyo ba bsgral gyi zhing// de bgani gshegs pa la dang bdag 'gyur gyi/
de nas klu rgyal po gser gtsug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis bzhus pa/ dngagrong chen po spyanadag dbang de phul// srid pa'i rgya mtsho ba la cung
Ta pha rol phyin/ skam la bzhugs pa sred bsams gang zag mchog/ 'gro ba'i don phyir khyod zhu bka' stsal gsolo// ji ltar spyad n bodi gshegs bdag skyo dang// rgyal ba'i bstan la
rab tu gnas gyur dang/ bdud phrug stong dag gas kyang mi bskyod pa/ kun spyan 'di dag bdag la bka' stsal gsol// sangs rgyas tshul la mig lo'ab gnas ri/ klu yi gtso bos
'dren la de zhus pa// klu yi bdag po'i bsam pa shugs chud nas// nongs kun sbyangs de ni lung bstan la// lhag bab bsam pas tshes kyis ldan zhing// des pa stong po khul la rab

byang chub kyin mi g.yo yide ba skyed cing/ 'jigs kun la'e ni la mngon po'i bstod// srida' brgal cang skam laNaM tu bzhugs M/ the tsom mam 'am tshe brtan brnyes nga//
[po ]/srid par bar gtan la nan du rab bzhugs la/ re pa 'a la lha yi gnas bcas bzhin// 'di ltar mi g.yo ba la skyabs mchu 'ong/ mi g.yo'i lta khul na 'gyur bar bgyi de tsho 'gul dang
ma bgul zhes mi gnas/ mgayo'i lab ltabur 'gyur bar bgyi// ma smad bsan de yi thugs chud nas// yid du bong kha'i dbyas kyis lung bstan/ bskal pa stong phrag brgyad cur spyad/
byas nas/ ma 'ongs pa yi dus susangs rgyas 'gyur// bde ba 'am gyis rgyal kha'i 'gyur ba ste// mtshan n legs mthong zhes bya shin tu sdug/ srog chags bye khastong phragazar byed cing/
bsil ba bde ba'i ba'i 'o ma 'god 'gyur// rgyal bas gsungs pa klu des thos nas su// gagal med duga' ba'i rims narab dang las// nyon mongs thams cad sel cing ma smad pa// gro
ba'i 'dren pa la ni phyag 'tshal byed/ de nas klu'i rgyal po ut+pala'i mig gis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus// mi mchog 'dul
mdzadu gzi brjid mtha' yas pa// thugs rab lha gang nyer nyal rolagshegs// gnas yon tan rab rnam grol la// zhal mkhas pa bde bar gshegs pa gsungs// khyed sras byang
chub ji ltar spyad bgyisan// zha gnas dga' 'ang 2 gnas bstan pa dang// gnas lan ji ltar mkhas par 'gyur// kun gzigs myur du bdagag sem nye khum// rgya'ab lan klu des
zhus pa dang// rgyal bas ut+pal mig la lung bstan pa// gang gso dge ba'i las kyis yid 'ong ba/ (zhi gnas la ni shin tu bslab par gyur/ bde
phyir byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa ni// spyad pa spyod pa sems g.yor mi byed cing// bskul pakhye bar zhi gnas bstan byas ba/ byang chub dam pa dang 'a mchog sangasaM rgyas 'gyur//
de mid ldab sha byang chub rtogs nas su// rnam badren 'gro ba lha la sbyor byed cing// rab tu sems g.yo bar ma 'gyur la// sems can nyon mongs ma g.yo skol byed// des pa
ut+palatshagi ga kAdes ni// rgyal bas legs par gsungs pa'i tshig thos nas// nyin mongs kun g.yo med na 'gyur te/ byang chub mchog rab sems n bskyed gyur to// de yato/
gnas sems la brten nas su// byang chub sems bskyed rgyal bde labastod// khyad labastod nas ka gnas rtogs gyur tshe// shin tu yod kasangs rgyas 'gyur bar bgyi
de nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyise ba zhus pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 2nas thugs su chud/ rgyal ba lang khro/
mchog la bdago// khyod nyid las 'khrungs byang chub rab gnas pa// ma mchog ji ltar lhag mthong dag la spyod// mi 'dul kha lo sgyur la dga' bos zhus// klu de'i sngon gyi mthab ni
gzages khasan// dge ba'i 'os bsags po dag thugs chud nas// ma 'dul kha 'a la 'a 'ad skad gsung// ye shes dam du byang chub mchogabatsal phyir// ma zhum yid kyis non dang 'bru dag
la ser sna med cing rdzas mang nyung dang// chung ma dang ni bdag nyade gtong bar byedo// de laso legs pa'i las de byus pa dang// gtong ba shani tu sdug bsngal mi rten pas na// ya shesaM
dam pa bdag la sangs rgyas 'gyur// de ni lhaga mthong spyod pa'i 'bras bu yani// de nas klu'i rgyal po nyi dgas khacom ldan 'das la tshigaMs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis shul
zhus pa// 'gro ba kun gyi 'dren la bdag zhu ba// khyod gras bu chub dza ltar spyad bgyis na// ' gnas lhag mthong mnyam par spyod pa dang// zang zingeched zhi byang chub 'thob 'gyur lags//
'dren pa de la klu des zhus pa dang/ ka nas lhag mthong yang dag len mkhyen pa// thogasal med pa 'dren pa 'dis brnyes pas// den bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan la bzhag/ byang chub
sems dpa' gang zhig spyad sbyong tshe// gnyi so' stobs 'di mnyam par bsten pas na// den bye ba khrag khrig mtha' yas shing// 'gro ba'i don du mnyam par rnam par sbyong/ bskal pa bye ba
mang por de 'tshang rgya// ga nga gi dam ba dag kyang dgod 'gyur te// de'i mtha' bsngags pa bskal pa bye nang du// sangs rgyas bye bas zad par de ma spyod// de tshe klu yi rgyal po nyi dga' yis//
theg pa mnyam ba'i bsngags pa thos nas su// gzhal du med pa'i dga'ongs sems bde nas// byung chub mchog gi sems r ba pa skyed gyur te/ 'jisi rten phan phyir byung
chub de lung bstan// ma 'ongs dus su sangs rgyas 'gyur ba ste/ mnge na rgyal ba bden pa kun spyan// srog chags phye ba stong khrag thar bar byed/ de nas klu'i rgyal po ma dros
zla/ pas/ bcom ldan 'das la cha gis su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis khul zhus pa/ bde gshegs khyod sus ji ltar spyad bgyis nas// 'gro ba'i don du phan pa tsho khyed cing/ byang chub bran
tshol la mi skyo ba// rkang gnyis dam pa mchogags de lung ston// cha lo khyu mchog lan klus zhus pa/ klu yi bdag po byisam pa thugs chud de// thub pa sngon ma'i sbyor la ma 'jigs
bas// klo yabadag po'i phyi tsam lung bstan pa/ byang chub 'a ba spyad pa spyod 'dod pa// des shing nyams pa med par sbyod pa dang// bdag dang gzhan dag la yang mi gnod cing// ser sna
med cing gtong ldan rgyal ba yin// de yis legasal ba las de byas pas na// 'grobagang ge 'khor bar bde 'dod la// dus shing thams cad du ni snying rje ldan// nor byin bas ni sdud pa byed
bar 'gyur// de yis legs bab las de byas pas na// nam du'ang skye bar sdug bsngal myong mi 'gyur// rtag tu bde bas skye bo bden 'god la/ kha na ma tho med cing gnas ka'i 'jog/
ston pa gsung gis klu de bskul bas na// mchog tu dga' bas sems na da gyur te// de yis skad cig sa la dusapatsugs nas// tshigs bcad snatshogs dgags rgyakhabastod ba/ (go'u/
tam 'jig rten kun na mo nyamachod de/ grob khri'i tshan bde gshegs lhang nge ba// khyod kyi zhal du lhar bcas 'gro kun lto// 'di ltar thal mo sbyar nas skyabs su mchi// byang chub mchog gi
yade ni bskyed bgyi zhing// ji ltar bde gshegs khyod kyi ye shes dang// ston pa khyod kyis sbe rtsom bsal ba ltar// bdag kyang thob nas 'jig rten the tsom bsal// de nas de ston
gakal mod byung chub phyir// yid ni tu dgyes nas bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten phan phyir 'dren par 'gyur ba yi// ma mchog mngon ribang bo chen po'o de nas
klub rgyal po ir banas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus ba/ 'jig rten dbag med mang po skyabs kyi mgo rgyal ba the tshom gcod la gu bgyi
pa byang chub sems dpas sug las rje bgyis na// sangs rgyas mngon du lhan cig 'phrad bag/ 'jig rten mgon po de la klus chusanas/ khagi rten rin phyin bden pas lung bas
ba solas can rgyud la nyon mongs rnama'age dang// yongs su dal ba'i 'di ni rnam shes nas// 'gro la phana'i snying rje bskyed nas zhu/ khyang chub mchog rin da sbyad ba spyod/ bdag dang/
rgyal ba ji ltar 'thad snyam nas// thabs la mkhas par [”“]mngon bar rab gnas te/ rgyal ba rnams dang bde gshegs myudon 'das/ sku gdung dag
la gzhal med mchod byed 'ang/ rnam grol yid kyis smon lam 'debs par byed// de yis legs pa'i 'os de byas pas na// rtag tu sangs rgyas mngon par 'phrad thob ste// rgyal ba man
ma mchod pa byas nas gu/ byang chub dga' ba 'od ldan reg par gyur// sangs rgyas kyis ni legs gsungs tshig thos nas/ o ra ba na kun yid mgu ste// gzhal du med pa 'i dga' bas
sems bde nas/ dang ba yid kyis sangs rgyas mngon bstod pa// mi 'dul la 'gyur la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod kyis bdagag som nya the tsom bsal// byang chub don du yid 'di bskyed bgyi ste//
sdug bsngal thar brgyade sangs rgyas 'gyur bar bgyi// gang bra mchog gis klu yi bdag po yi// bsam pa thugs chud byang chub lung bstan pa// bskal pa bye ba brgyad cu rtsa ba ru// spyod pa spyad
skun s de nas sangs rgyas 'gyur/ mi mag mtshan thams cad sgrol ba ste/ srog chags bye ba stong phrag thar par byed// de yi ring bsrel mang por 'gyur pa ste// skye bo mang po mtho ris sgrol
ma// klu de ston pa'i gsung gsadagabagyur nas// 'jig rten phan mdzad rnam 'dren mngon bstod pa// khyod kyis 'gro ba'i don na rgya cher mdzad// sdug bsngal tha mdzad sangs rgyas ]
kha gas pa bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes rgyas pa'i mdo sngon po tshe mthar phyin zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo bam po bcu gnyis pa/
de nas klu'i rgyal po tshob pa'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das 'tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhusal/ lhadang bcas ba'ajig rten don slad du// 'jig rten don mdzad rnam/
'dren la zhu ba/ sbyad pa spyod tshe sug las ji bgyis pas/ ma rtogs rtogs nas rgyal ba rnam 'dren 'gyur/ ga pa'i bu des rgya 'al mno zhus nas// nyon mongs thams cad bsal
bas lung bstan pa// dog ba'i las kyis 'bras bu 'di 'ong zhing// nyon mongs bcom pas des na rgyal zhes bya// da na 'gro kun tshe dang sangs rgyas l// mchog tu dad pa dag gis sems kyang
shes/ de las las kyi lam de byas pa na// 'gro ba'i brtag pa rgyal ba dag tu gyur// de gas rgyal ba'i bshad pa thos nas su// 'gro ba thams cad la dad par byas// de tshe de
yis dge ba byas pas na/ 'di yi smon lam btab ltar bdag 'gyur ro// de nas 'jig rten mgon pos de lung bstan/ mi mchog sangs rgyas su gyur ba ste/ srog chagase ba stong phrag
thar byed cing// spyad pa spyod tshe rgyal ba mngon par bstod// ston pa 'a gsung bas klu de dga' gyur nas// sangs rgyas la ni ded bskyed mngon bstod ba// 'gro ba thar mdzad sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal/
la bsam yas bde gshegs nang khyod phyag 'tsha2la// de nas klu'i rgyal po nag ngos/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis/
zhu ba zhus pa// drang srong chen po skyabs mchog dang gtu med// skyon dang bral zhing yon tan mchogabarnyes nga// stobasal 'jigs pas rnam grol khyod lani// byang chub lta spyod mkhas
tsha par ba gnas zhu// des pa nyon mongs ji ltar ba sal ba dang// rgyal ba'i mchog 'di ji ltar bsgom par bgyi bdud kyi spyod yul de dag ji ltar sbyang// sangs rgyas spyod yul dag la
ra ji ltar spyad/ rgyal ba lan kru sa zhus pa dang// ji ltar bde gshegs spyod yul spyad pa dang// ji ltar bdud kyi spyod yul spong ba dag/ lag gnyis shin tu mkhyen pas rang tu bstan/
ston pa la na klu bdagade zhus nas// de yi bsam pa shugs chud lung bstanang// mamakhasas gang dag sems can 'du shes spyod// de dag nag po'i rtsa lag sbyod yul spyod// gang dag sems
[%]can med cing yod mi gnas// de dag thams cad gzigs pa'i spyod yul spyod// nag po'i rtsa lag dag las rgyal nas// byang chub bla med lta ba des 'thob pe// ston pa'i gsung gis
klu de dag 'gyur nas// bdud kyi spyod yul myur bar rnam spangs te// sangs rgyas thams cad gzigs pa'i spyod yul dag/ bstan pas de ni myur du rgyal bar 'gyur/
danas klu'i rgyal po go'u ta mas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bdapa' deng las kyisatub nus ba/ pa'osgyur mchog khyod la zhu bgyi'o// badren pa khyod sus ji ltar spyad bgyis/ klu yi/
skye gnas dug na gnod bgyid rung/ sangs rgyas tshul gyi myu gu skyed par bgyid// bde bar gshegs la glu des sku so ba dang/ de yi bsam pa thugs chud lung bstan pa// sems can med laM/
rgyalaba'i sras spyod cing// byang chub sems la nams kyang de mi gnas/ de na stong nyid khong du chud pa yin/ mkhas pamtshan ma smon lam rnamag spangs shing// mdzangs ba ma dmigs pa la nas
bdag// de ni sangs rgyas chos mngon myu gu skyed// ston pa 'a ge gsung gis klu de dgab gyur nas// mi dmib/sa pa la brtan pas rab gnas shing// bdud kyi Tagasabarungs dam po bcad nas su//
sangs rgyas tshul la klu nang ba tu gnas// 'jig rten mkhas pas byang chub de lung bstan/ ma 'ongs dus su sangs rgyas 'gyur ba ste/ ( rnam thar rgyal zhes phyogs su rnam grags shing/ bdud kyi dbang
song srog chags thar par byed/ ston nga ba gsung gis de dgab gyur nas// thal mo spyar nas sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal byed// khyod kyi lam bstan pas nas nigs rgyas bsten// ma mchog thar mdzad ste
la phyag 'tsha' go/ de nas klu'i rgyalaM kom ba lab sgras/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa// zlakhab bod ltar dri med mthu che zhing/ mi/
mchog rang byung gyur la zhu'agyib// rnam 'dren sazhi ji ltar spyad bgyis na// than bar 'jug rung rjes su skye bar 'gyur// gal te stong nyid smon med rjes song shung//
phung bo mtshan mami ldan bral ba dang// nam mkha' 'dra ba'i chos kyang rnam shesan// pha yi lam du bu yang rjes 'gror 'gyur// ston bs legs par gsungs pas de dgab nas// dmigs su chod
wI pa de ni mas bskyed do// 'jig rten mkhas pas byang chub de lung bstan/ rjes su mthun bad sbyod pa spyad khus shing// nang mchog dgakyang yongs su sbyangs nas su// ma 'ongs dus su sangs rgyas/
'gyur pa ste// zla bas lhag par phyogs su rnam grags shing// sred par 'gro ba'i sems can thar par byed// kam pa 'a zhes ming btags glu de ni// shAkya sras mkhas byang chub lung bstan nas//
sems ni dga' zhing yongs su yid mgu ste// 'gro kun thar par mdzad la mngon bstod ba// thub pa che la 'di ltar skyabs su mchi// sangs rgyas 'gyur bar the tsom bdag ma mchis// mun pa dag
la sgron ma gzung bgyi zhing// leng ba mig ma mchis lam bstan gi/ de nas klu'i bdag po yul 'khor srung gas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyas kyis zhu
ba chus 'a mgon po 'jig rten long bar gyur pa'i tshogi/ mig sbyin sman pa drang srong che la tu// gang gis 'jis rten rnam thar lam bzang dang// ka ba'i sar mchi rkang gnyis dbang po gsungs//
stobs bcu'i stobs ma ba rnam par thar pa'i lamaston// 'jig rten mgon po rkang gnyis dabang pos de lung bstan// gang gis yun rings zhugs ba'i sdug bsngal lam gale'ang/ kha bor ba nyes
ni mya ngan 'das pa la gsal bar 'go ston la klu yi rgyal pos lam kha thos nas su// sdug bsngal ba la snying rje dam pa bskyed byas shang// klu yi rgyal pos byang chub 'dun pa drag bskyed de// stobs
ba'i stobs 'chang 'jig rten mgon du bdag 'gyur byed// stobs bcu'i yon tan mnga' bas klu dbang lung bstanang/// ma yo seng gabadaganyid mu stegs dgrar gyur zhing// sems can matha' yas
dbagamod 'khor bar grub dag// bde gshegs mchog ga tshig gis 'dren cing thar par byed// ston pa'i gsung chos/klu yi rgyal pos thos nas su// dga' ba'i sems kyis sor bcu'i rtse mo la
sbyar te/ mi dbang 'jig rten mgon po drang srong chen po la// gus pa bskyed nas 'khrul med tshig gis mngon bstod pa// skyabs mchog shin tu thugs gtu ngas mtshungs med ye shes teg khagro
bab de se ba spyad cing dag la yun ring dang// 'gro ba'i bsam kha mtha' yas khyod kyi thugs chud pas/ des na mi dbang/ khyod ni 'jig rten rgya cher grags// de nas klu'i rgyu'agoser
mgrin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs subacad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ stobs bcu stobs mnga' stobs che stobs dang ldan pa ste// thugs dag snang mdzad 'od dang ldan shing sdug mi mnga'/
sri rgyal blo gros bzung bas 'gro ba shin tamkhyen// rgyal ba dge spyod kun tu dri med zhal gsungs shig/ mi mchog rdul bral khyod sras ji ltar spyad bgyis na// mkhas

ba' me dkrugs ma bskyod pa drug thugs chud cing// rgyalal rdu'agyur dpag tshe dbargya ni yongs su mkhyen// rgyal sras skya bo ldan mdzad thugs su chud pa'i spyan// blo gros dpag tshod mnga' ba lha ma mkhas
lnga pa so/ bu mar bgyis shing rgyal ba dpag medas yas bskor// mkhas pa dus su 'gro ba dpag med phan mdzad dgongs// stobs bcu mnga' bklu ya 'gro ba kun la gsungs// blo'achal khral

tshe nange blo gtsang rjes dgongs brtagapar mdzod// nga yasras mchog rgyal bsten na sha zad byed pa// 'thob cing rgyal bas mchod rung rdul med skyon bralareg/ 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal dang ga med brgya shes
ljo yongs su 'grol// stongs dpu'i blo gros mngal 'as klu yi bdag po yis// rgasha zad bya thosanas rab tu yid dga' ste// 'gro la phan yid byang chub yade byas rgyal ba'i mchog rnagaladen po mnga'
'gro la phan mdzad mngon bstod pa// 'gro ba mang po mun pa rab rib lange togadag/ gcod mdzad 'gro 'di'i sdug bsngal 'joms shing mun pa dang// rab 'ab lang tog sa'a mdzad bdud rtsi la ma//
shin tu dri med spyan mnga' dag ba phyogs bcur ston// klu yibadag po'i gseradapul lta bu'i khyim gshegs shing// yon tan dpag med mnga' ba shin tu thugs su chud// blo gros sgrol mdzad 'od zer/
stong 'dra'i spyanama' zhal// ma 'khrul glongs ma smad gzi rinamakhas pa gzi// stobs bcu 'od chen mang ba la 'guba'i tshig gse bstod/ rgyal mchog bdag nyid bde ldan sangs rgyas byang
chub nas// 'gro ba 'khyams shing mgon med pa'i sdug bsngal gyis// nyam thag sdug bsngal dpag med pasal te thar nga ra bgyi// bde dang 'dang zhi ba'artul med rgya che sprul// ka kha 'alam
du zhugs nas bdag sangs rgyas bgyi// rgyal ba brgya yis thugs chud bdud kyi stobs dag ni// stobs med bgyi ba rI amakhatsang dag gzhug par bgyi// de nas klu'i rgyal po mgrin
sngon gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis gzhus pa/ ston mchog ma 'dul khalasgyur la 'bagyi ba// 'dren pa khyod kyi spus na jo ltar spyod bgyis na// kha na ma na
cad g la rdul bral dang// nyon mongs med cing byang chub dam mchog sangs rgyas 'gyur// 'gro ba'i donado badran pas gsungs pa gang// dar ba khyod nyid las 'khrungs las thob nas//
kha na ma tho med cing bdag dang gzhan// sangs rgyas gyur dang byang chub the tshom khum// mgrin sngon klu de yis ni rgyus pa dang// 'jig rten kun la chagasapached pa'i thugs// chos rnams kun
mi 'jigasadabang brnyes shing// ston pa'i gsung la legs gnas lung bstan pa// pa'i sras 'jig rten gsum ma chags shing// 'gro lon par spyad pa spyod byed pa// 'dod pa'i khams dang
gzugs kyi khams drag dang// gzugs med khams su'ang ched du bgyi'o// myan 'das dbus gzhal med 'dus ma byas/ khams cad kyi ni sdug bsngal rbadang
bko/ de nanyin bzung 'jig rten gas med yid// rgyal la rgyal ba'i dbang po rab tu sgom// de yis legs pa 'os de byas bas na// gos pa med cing 'jigs med rnams spyod pa// bdag
dang gdan la gnod pa med gnas te/ bdag nyid med byang chub mngon 'tshang rgya// denu rnamasmin de las rjes mthun pa// shin tu dka' bas byang chub 'tshang rgyur 'gyur// de la spyi kho grog tshogs lha
zhi dang klu/ ma dang srin po dag gis ma mthong ngo// klu mgrin sngon po stobs po che de ni// gangs rgyas kun mkhyen gsung gis dga' gyur nas// sor mo bcu yi thal sbyar mgo btud de// 'jig rten
na mdzad 'dren la phyag 'tshal byed// mi mchog lan da lta bodag skyabs mchi// yab kyi rjes su sras kyang mi brgya zhe pe// mthar bgyidi bcom la byang chub 'tshang rgyur bgyi// sems can
ltasdug bsngal chos kyis gnod gyur dgrol// 'jig rten mkhas pas byang chub de lung bstan// khyod ni ma bos dus su 'tshang rgya ste// kun tu spyan zhes phyogs rnam grags shing// 'gro ba'i srid
los sems can grol bar byed// de nas klu'i rgyal po'ajiges sgrogs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus kha/ mi 'dul kha 'gyur kha yod la/
'das// ston pa sug las ci bgyis bdag zhu'o// rgyal ba de ni snam phyogs gzigs pan// dkya'i 'khor tsam gyi san mdun du gyur// chos 'dres pa'i rgyal bas de lung bstan// kun mkhyen/
mkhyen pas bsam pazugs chud nas/ bla na med pa'i thugs ni bskyed mdzad de// de bzhin me mchog gisan 'di'i lung bstan// bde ba 'byung bo dag gis las byas shing// dedwagasdan tshad yang dang
yang dran pas// de yi rnam smin las ni 'od ltar shes// de yagazigs par san 'gyur ba yin// rgyal bas legs gsungs tshig ni thos nas su// klu rgya la de na mchog tu 'gyur nas// bdag
ba zang zang med pa'i dga' bskyed de// brgya la lam nas sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal byed// de nas klu'i rgyal po gcan gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i debyangs kyis
zhu ba zhus pa// lam ston pa la lam na reb ston cing/ 'jig rten don mdzad 'don la zhu bgyi ba// sngon tshad tu 'phrin lasaci mdzad na// ji ltar dgongs ba bgan du cha gnas mdzad/ khag
rten mgon po rgyal bas de lung bstan// sems can klu ni ga dulala'i dus bab cing// 'gro ba thams cad la nikhan ba'i phyir// 'dren pa bdud stobs 'dzegs pas lung bstan// 'das pa'i/
dus su spyad pa spyod pa 'tshe/ tshul bganam lan sems dang gnyer mne pagi/ nams kyang mi sems rtag tu lha gnas bstan// de la ngas ni yun ring bslabs pa yin// de ba chen rgyal ba dag
dgi mchod rten la// 'breng ba ni chen dag ni bkram na nge phul// de yis legs par 'os de byas pas na// nyon mongs sems dang nams kyang mi gnas so// nga yis
bskal pa stong phrag phye ba ru// gzhan la gnod pas nams kyang gnod ma byas// nga ni de las kyi rnam smin rgyus// ji ltar bsams pa kani zhi gnas rten bar byed// drang srong che bas lung bstan bad/
zlothos nas/ gab can klun dga' bar gyur pa na/ gzhal du med pa'i bde bas sems dga' nas// ston pa'i mdun 'dug tshegs su bcad pas bstod// 'gro ba kun ldang nyon mongs zhi mdzad cing/
de dag sems la khyod kyisibastan pa mdzad// thub ba nyon mongs med par 'jig rten spyod/ zla 'od lta bur glo ni phyag 'tshal lo// de nas klu'i rgyal po rnam par snang byed kyis//
bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ sngon tshodag tu 'phrin las ru mdzad na// thub pa khyod kyi sku la rdul mi gos/ dpe mod rnam gnon 'di deg bdag la gsung pa/
! gang dag thos nas dag thagis sbyad bgyi// rnam par snang byed dag ba 'tshol ba'i kus// 'jig rten mgon de la ni shus pa dang// nyon mongs kun sel yan lagabargyad ldan gang// stan/
wacing 'jebs ba'i sgras na lung bstan ba// nga yis sngon chad byang chub tshol ba na// noms kyang tshul bzhon ma yanasems ma bsams// nams kyang rab tunyesasems ngas ma bskyod// bla chad
ba/ byams las yang dang yang du byas/ nga yis dge ba'i lasade byas pas na// bla med byang chub zhi ba reg nas su// mi mchog rgyal ba thub ba'i sku dag dang// na babra' la yang rdul gyis ma gos so//
rgyal ba 'phrin las dge bsags de thos nas// rnam par snang byed klun yid dga' ste// son banub thelam sbyar nas mgo bo yis// rgyal ba'i zhabs la mngon par phyag 'tshal byed//
legs so rgyal kha mu khyed sngon du gshegs// khyod kyis rgya che mthatsayas don dag mdzad// srid pa'i tshogs la dga' zhing sdug bsngal gyis// gdungs pa 'gro ba mtha' dag khyod kyis bkrol/
skye bo dug gdug reg ba'i smon pa ste// skye ba'i dug bcos khyod na gso sman lags// me 'bar ki ltar rim gyis mya ngan 'da'// 'di ltar thal sbyar mgos btud skyabs su mchi/
de nas klu'i rgyal po bsgyings pas/ bcom ldan 'das 'tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ rnam 'dren dge ba'i ba phrin las nyi mdzad na// zhabs na shin tu mnyam gang brtan pa
brnyes// gang dag thos nas ni tu yid rag 'thob// mi yi mchog gyur de dag bdag la gsungs// klu yi rgyal po bsgyings pas rnam par 'dren// 'jig rten mas bas 'di de shus pa dang//
yid du 'ong ba'i tshigs bcad sna tshogs kyis// klu ya rgyal bo'i yid ni dga' bar gyur// nga yis tshul khrims brtul zhugs rnam dag bsgrubs// nga yis gzhan yang tshul khrims brtul zhugs
dbasgoms// ngas ni dge'akhelas de byas pas na// rkang pa nyamapadagags sa la'og/ de tshe thams cad mkhyen pas lung bstan ba/ rdul bral kun 'di dga' mgu
gyur nas// gzhal du med pa ga pa de bas sems dga' ste/ sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog la phyag 'tshal khyer// legs so rgyal ba 'od mdzad rdul bcom shing/ shin tu nyon mongasaM bag chags
bcas pa bcom// zla nyi'i dkyil 'khor sgra gcan gyis btang ltar/dgu bcom nas na phyogs rnams tu gsal// de nas klu'i rgyal po 'od chen gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la
tshag sa su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jame rten sman slad du// 'jig rten 'das gsungs 'dren la tu pa gyab// rkang gnyis dam pa sug las su bgyis na// rnam
'dren gnas ma lags pa 'tshal ba 'thob// sngon tshe dag tu spyad pa spyod pa na// lus dang ngag yid dang na sims kyis kyang// bde ba 'byung pa' lung dag las byas te// las gang byas pas
nams kyang gdung ma 'gyur// rab tu dag shing dge bas brlan pa dang// gnasal yin pa'i lam gyod thams cad ni// dgabcu'i las kyi lam gyis rnam par sbyangs/ gnas ma yin pa 'an
waM mongs thams cad bsko// rnam 'dren de bas las de mdzad bsan// bad nas 'gos nas gzhan 'phrul dag tu gshegs// mal ba'i rten brtas nas der 'das te/ kha med gnas la
'a0 yin babashes pas 'breg/ gnas ma yin bshe sa la nams kyang gi/ bye ba khrag khrig bdud kyis bskyod gnyis// sems dang de la zhan nyon mongs mde grol te// de bzhin gshegs khras 'gro kun
rab tu mkhyen// ston pas lung bstan bas na bod chen klu/ yid ni mgu ga nga shan tu dag 'gyur te// gzhal du med bab bde bas sems dag ba nas// yon tan kun gyi pha rol gshegs la phyag
'tshal byed// shin tu thugs dul yade gnyis 'dzoms pa po// bdatshalas brgala'ang skam la shin tu bzhugs// thub chen rgalatsang 'gro ba la mdzad pa// ltar nyi mas mun pa bsal
nas su// gzugs kyi rnam ba snang zhing gsalal ltar// de bzhin ston ba thugs ni rnam grelngatang// soms can sdug bsngal mang gnod thar mdzad pa// gas spyin gso ba'i dpyad lazug
'tshal lo// de nas klu'i rgyal po rab tu gdung byed kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcadu ba'i dbyangs kyiso zhu ba zhus pa/ rgyal gser mdog 'dzin las 'chadan/ dug
gsum mkhyen larab tu brtan par bzhugs/ nam ma ba lta bur mkhyen ldan zhu bgyis pa// 'greba'i 'dren pas de dag bdag la gsungs// thogs med khyen bas thugasanam chags shing//
som nyi'i gcod la the tshom sela mdzad pa// rgyal ba rang byung lugs kyis de'i bsam pa// shin tu thugs chud de na lung bstan pa// rtag tu dge ba dran ldan stan byed cing// ngesal ba las khyas pas nai
bde 'byung dang/ rtag tu la/nyan yang shes la 'jog byed cing/ bdag nyid ji tsamashes bser sna med// mkhas pa re yas las de khyos bsan// lus zhig nas
ni gzhan 'phrul dag tu 'gro// 'did pa dag na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang// thur du 'bab cing tshe yi bar du byung// dus gsum shes la rnam par rtse byed rung// bdag dang de bzhin ga ga na yang
shes par byed/ bags pa srab cung blo dang ldan gyur ba// bde gshegs thogs pa med pa/sa lung bstan to// shin tu blo ldan mchog gis bstan thos nas/ klu chen rab tu gdung byed dga'
phyi gyur te/ byang chub gzhal du med la rab gnas shing// yang dag bsngags pa sa ma mchog rgyal pa bstod// dus gsum mtshan nyid gag tu gzigs mdzad cing// las dwang rnam
smane de bzhin rab tu mkhyen// soms na pa/ pa/ khyud nga ra de pa mkhyen// bde wa/ shags thams cad gtong la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas klu'i rgyal po stobs chen gyis//
pacom ldan 'das la tshugs su pa chud pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhusal/ male tshog mchog lab mkhyen rab mathalas ba// mgon po rdul bral thugs ni yongs su dag/ bdag gi sos lta skyor khol
the tsom khang// byed kar dus phyir da bar gshegs pas gsungs// ji ltar sngon tsher ma dang lha dag gis// sug las byas pa blo ma khas ji ltar 'tshal// ji ltar bla med byang chub kachog ga
da pa bdag gi the tsun zhus pa myur bur gsungs// stobs bcu'i stobs mkhyen bdag nyid shin tu nges// rgyal la klu yis zhus pa myur gsungs te// nga yis ji ltar ma ya spyod kun dang/
du go ba'i bsam pas byang chug natsol phyud cing// ji ltar yid rab dga' bas sgrub pa dang// ji ltar spyi dgusdug bsngal gyis gnod tsong// mtha' ma mthong langan 'gror ltung ba dang//
nyon mongs pa rgya yis kun bor gyur pa shes// der ni sems can snying pos snying rje bskyed// nga yis sems can 'dultag sdug bsngal dgrol// thar bar 'gyur ngalam mortogadag tu bgag/
nga yis ngan 'gro dag ga lam ngan dgag/ nga yis lam mchog sha ba rab tu bstan// bde ba'i lam gyis byung tshul kob bkur// stobs bcu'alam mchog rab tu bstan bya nyang// mun 'de
mi dag ga ni don 'gyur bya// de ltar partan pa des na snying rjebaskyed// drang srong chen po dag rgyu bsgru gnas su// mgorung mige dang de bzhi ni sha dgun// btang nas bde gshegs lag
nas dpa' bo 2kra// sngon gyi dus su ma yis spyad pa ni// de tshe rmi lam lta bur rab tumkhyen// dag la rag las shes lan// sogs bcu mnga' lamachod partsol lan khyed/
mgon gzhal med de gzhen dad bskyed nas// ji ltar 'gro kun ma don du bdag 'gyur snyam// nga ltar smyowe 'phongs tsho bdag gis ni// stobs bcus bstan pa'i 'og la gzhag pa bya//
dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag bsten pan// 'dzin pa dag gis spyod la rjes su bslab// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mtha' las ga (lam gol song ba rnams la lam/
mchog bstan// 'di ltar bdag nyid chen po'i spyad spyod na// ma a sngon gyi 'phrin las byas pa mthong// rmi lam lta bur byas par rnama'agacung// de na dun la pha rol dga'/'ang ston//
stobs bcu mnga' ba'i bka' blos nas su// stobasachen klu na yod dga' mgu gyur nas// sor bcu'i thal mo spyi bor sbyar btud de// byang chub na thob bya phyir rgyal ba bstod// rnam par
'dren la bdag gis dad pa skyed pas// stobs bcu' mdzad bdag ni bdag gis bgyi// skye ba lam gol 'gro gi ngo mun gyur rnams// byang chub sha ba thob par bdag gis bgyi
de nas klu'i rgyal po de chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das tshig tu pad dud pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa// stobs bcu mnga' pa sbyang to yongs grol mdzad// 'dren pa'i ng byung lan de dag da khyu//
ji ltar ston pa'i gros kyis brtson bskyedanas// zhal du med tu nga chub mchog thob 'gyur// ji ltar 'phrad pa'i brtson 'grus stobs kyis gu// bla med byang chub byang chub kems thob pa/ yon/
tan dang ga med ye shes mchog mang ba pa'i// drang srong chen pos sus zhu sa lung bstan pa// byang chub don du nga yis sngon spyad ba// ji ltar 'grob rnams su stobs brtson pa sten// brtson 'grus/
stobs kyis byang chub pas brnyes pa// de na nga yas tsung thor bshad par bya// 'dasab 'dus gu ma'i bdag byung ba ni/ ma yi de khang phyag ma dbang stobs 'chang zhes// rin chen bdun yod/
gu dang ldanupa ste// bdag se pa/khri phrag brgya dag byung// de tshe 'jig rten khams 'do'id rgyas pa ste/ deng bdagaces sangs rgyas gang dag byung// deganam mchog rang byung byung
gyur drang/ rin chen dpal shes 'jig rten smra rnams grags// mi mchog de yi nyan thos dge 'dunani// sa ya phrag brgyad cu dag phyung ngo// bde gshigs mchog gi rjes skyes sras tshogs
nyon mongs khro dang nga rgyal tshab rwa la'a'o// de tshe mi mchog de ya byung chub sems// sa ya phrag ni brgyad cu dag byung ste// rgyal ba dpag mid dga' spyad ldan te// 'gro la phan phyi byang chub
ba 'gyur ste// den rnam par 'dren pa de yi ni/ byang chu sems dang 'a bdud ston te sa khu byung// drang srong chen po bdud stobasar 'joms pa// de yi tshogs kyi gtso'i de byed do/ de nas
bdud stobs bsnyen par da gab shes ra// lhab khu byung nas 'dun pa rgyal ba'i mchog/ de na byang chub mchog tu gshegs pa la// ltar ma'i khya phyir bar chad byed// sa bad rgya mtshor bcas
pa yon tan ldan// de dgabud med tshogs kyis mno sprulate/ bzang mo yon tan rab mchog 'dzin pas bkang// dga' kha' tshig dang yid 'ong tshig sna de// ma ni pazang la 'gros kyang ldan
bag can// glang po'i sna ltar lug mnyam dag ba'i mdog/ yun ri dag tu brtul zhugs 'dzin pa ste/ na ma su la legs dang ldan pa yane/ gatshig snyan rung
pad ma 'dra ba'i mig so phreng ba thags dam tshang ba ste// byu ru'i mdog ltar mchu ni mdzes pa yani/ bzhan dang 'gram ba dag na mdzes dang ldan/ bzhan gyi mdogan khru ba dri med
'phrog/ 'dzum gange tshig na snyan po gtong ba ste// glang mchog myos pa lta bur mdzes pa'i 'gros// ngo tsha shes pas blo gros na bskangs// nu ma bra nyeng tshig gis 'ani ba ste/ ni
dgas rgyal po lta bur de lus 'chang// bzang ma'alus ngos srab cing 'dris dang ldan// ri dgas rgyal po la phyin 'dra rtse 'gro nyape/ rkang pa mnyam par rol pa'i thugs su 'gro/
'dod chags ldang bar 'gyur ba'i bu mo dus// bdud kyis rnams thums rud gang byas ba// dmar ba zung du ldan pa'i myosum ste// bdud kyis bdud kyi zhags pa mdun du bstan/ de
la 'dod pa bdud stobs bsacad dag/ de tshe paspyod nas bdud sten 'jigs byas kyang/ nag po'i nusalag de yag po ma nus// bor chad bya bar rab tum tshugs so// de nas ngashin
tum bzad srin po ni// bye pa dag gis tshig rtsub smra bar byed// dpag tu med rung bsam yas mu med nga// lus bong mtha' yas mngon sprul tshig rtsub lci// mdung thung mda' bo che yis
za rgyus ge skyo pa// 'di klad pa myur du ri yas tshes// 'dayaM sApe gzi brjid yod pa phyogs// myur du du rus 'dar gange 'gog par gyis// thapa cig tsam la 'dra na srog ma sbyin//
jiltar bded ra['']dan pad chun na/ padag gal srid gnod pamed par 'gyur/ nga sa 5 dgag =u0f7csa nas su// rgyal ba'i bstan pa de la par med cig/ de tshe lo bu'i
rnam pa snod la da/ mgo ging du 'go gnyis pa dag byung// supo rnams ni sgra bachedapa 'ded la mdung dang mda' bo che dag thegs// la ladwagakyang r ni khyir kha ste//
la sdang ba'i rims kyis sprul 'dzin nuseng/ de yi mdun du shin tu sgra dag 'byin// de tshel la gnod spyi pyod sprul te// 'ug gdug padung lus gnyis lag pa lta/ gsum dag yod
pes lus ki[”]'ag ba gcig/ de tshe lus gcig mngon par sprul byas shing// de tshe de la shan mgo ba'i mngon par sprul// de nas lus gnu mngon par sprul byas te// de dag bong bu ra
dang bya la dang// stag gagadong ste 'jigs par byed pa dag/ so so mi 'dra ba ya skad dag rtagane// beng bu'i gdong na ra ya skad 'dunecing// rayigadengo ni gong bu'i skyod 'dunel//
bong du glang po'i skad dang rta skad 'byin// bong bu gnyisig kha nas skad kun 'byin// de tshe ra yadewanas thams cud skad// shin tu 'jis/sa skad dpag tu med pa 'byin// gab na yang
bde gshegs bstengs par bya ba'i phyir// glang po'il nas si rtsubo dpag med 'byin// de tshe glang po bong bu'i skad 'byin cing/ de bgan rta dang de 'gan glang
po dag/ rnam pa mtha' yas skad dag 'byin byed kyang// bde gshegs ba spu'i khung bu 'ang maM g.yos so// rtan glang bo'i skad dag khyen byed cing// deb ni spre'un rta ya skad dag kun//
spre'u'i kha nas 'thams skad 'byin kyang/ bde gshegs bsdu'i lung yang g.yos mgyur// ri dgas rgyal red [”]a skad 'byani cung bong bu phyugs dang bya bya skad 'ad// de rnam
'dren gtse bar ma nus shing/ ba spu'i khung bu'ang g.yos par ma gyur to// de tshe stagon phag ga skad 'byin cing// de tshe phyugadang bya na sprul skad 'byin// rnam 'dren de ni ko bar ma nus
tshushing/ bar chad bya bdag tu'ang ma tshugs so// ri dgas khyu mchog ces pa ge'i skad 'byin rung/ byi la la ni phag gi skad 'byon la// ma he dag na stagag skabadunakyang// 'jig rten
mkhas pa bar chad bya ma nus// debatone phyugs kyi kha nasamatha' yas// rnam pa bye ba sems can skad 'byin kyang/ rnam 'dren de na gtso bar ma nus shing// bar chad bya ba lag tu'ang
ma tshugs so// stagan 'i degs khyu mchog skyid 'byin cing// de bzhin bong bu'i skad dang rtayaskad// de tshe doman seng ge 'i skad 'byin kyang// 'jig rten phan mdzad ba spu'i khung ma g.yos//
dredu nam mkha lcape ga sa 'apune tung/ de tshe re bgane glang po rta skad 'byin// rnam 'dren de ni theg rtse yan chu An pe// bar chad bya ba dag tu'ang ma tshugs so/ nam mkhalaldang na khu
byung/ dpe a ne yugs gan skad la phyine/ na tsa'i skadun yang dag dan+tubyin lug ka shapa tu'u' skad rnams 'dun ltar spyod// de tshul la bang ka'ayang dug skad/
dAtshigatshad ma gang la sa'i skad// de tshe nyams su dga' ba rma bya'akod// de bzhinatsan ru 'iskad da mug skad// phyugasagon zhes su grwa dbun par byed// de tshakal
dpe kayid 'ong gar/ koka'atsho rtsa ba dgan 'byin byed kyang/ rgyal ba'i thul san/nan ta ka/ sbrul ni grung po tIshad pa 'dun khyed tshe de bzhin glang po sprul
gyi skad 'byin drung/ rnam 'dren de latshu bar ma nus shing// bar chad phub dgatu'ang ma tshugs so/ de tshong pa seng ge 'i skad la phyin lunge// de 'de khyim bya bru yi skad 'byin
kyang rnam 'dren de la gtso bar ma nus shing// bar chad bya ba dag tu'ang ma tshugs so// rtan dri bu la skad dag 'byin khyed rung// de kha nelcan nu ge bou0f38skad 'byin kyang// rnam
'dren de ni gtsang ra ma nusashage/ bar chad khya ba dag tu'ang ma tshugs so// glang po 'ug pa tsanatsa'i skad 'byin pa// khyu dang khyu mchog skad 'byin khrung khrung skad// de tsho bya rgod 'dzaM
ma' spyad 'byin cing// bya dang khyu mchog b+he re'i spyod 'byin la// nga ba'i kho nas skad rnams thams cad 'byin// de khagan khu byug gnod sbyin kun gyi skad//
de tshe grul bum thams cad skad 'byin cing// de banyani khacug nasaMn skad kun 'khyen// kha la rnam pa de las de skad 'byin// skudagatsug tan mtha'alas skad 'byin kyang/ rnam 'drenur
la gtso bar ma nus shing// bar chad byed pa dag tu'ang ma tshugs so// klu ya kha nas rdo yi char 'bebs shing// de bzhin mtshon cha drag po'i char khebs kyang// snum 'dren de tsa
bar ma nus shing/ khur chad byed pa dag tu'ang ma tshugs so// gnod sbyin kho nas rdo yo char 'bebs shing// de bgan me rab 'bar ba'achan 'bebs la// de bzhana' deng phyug na chan
'bangs kyang/ bde gshegs bar ched bya bar ma nus so// grul bum mda' yi char dang de la ni du// me 'bar dang na mtshon cha'i char 'bebs kyang// rnam 'dren med la ga rtse par ma
lhanus shing// bar chad byed pa dag tu'ang ma tshugs so// de tshe bdud na sdug can de yas su// shin tu mi bzad rnam pas gtses byas kyang// brtson 'grus dpag med stobs na bskyed
bas su// bdud stobs sten pa byang chub rtogs par chud// rang byung gis ni bdud sde spa bkong zhange/ ljon mchog dung du skyel mo dbyer med bcas// sbyin pa rlung gsephyar ltar bcom
nas su// byang chub mchog reg skye dag thugs su chud// de tshos ni rnam dug 'bu ga yos shing// bstan par dka' ba'i sded phyogs 'tshol te// rlung gi rgyal pos byan khyer ba
ltar// bde bar gshegs pa 'ogatsi yis rnam par bcom// klu dang gnod sbyin srin po sde dag gas// de tshe sna tshogs gdang na mngon par sprul/ da dus/ bdud bstan pa[”]yi gabri
bdakyis// khani bye pa yod pa de dgabs// ji ltar nga yig bdud kyi'u mo bcom// dud med dag bdag nyid der rgya nas// di padud stobs bstan dka' rang
gis sprul// bdud stobs stan pa'i tshothu yasebcom par gyur// bde gshegs mchog la lha ya bus sprul pakang// 'jig rten rnam par 'dren pas zil gyis mnan// lha ya ba
mo khri phrug brgyad cu kun// bdud bstan pas na khyang chub dag la btsud// rnam par btul cing khyang chub mi g.yo gnas// de tshe lasnyan par dka' ba sdug bsnga la gyur/ de yi tshen/
bdud sten byung nas su// 'gro ba de dag bdag gis grol bar byas// de ltar nga yis brtson 'grus bskyed pas su// de tshe thub par dka' ba'i bdud 'os rgyal// rdul bral zhi
mtshog byang tshub batshol na// nga yi sras kyis de ltar bslab par bya// sems can bye ba mang po'i don bya shing/ nams kyang bdag gi phyir ni pa de mi bya// ji ltar mgo la me 'bar
na mu sems// skyes bus ka lta bur brtson 'grus spyod// de ltar sha martog dag 'tshol ba na// yid kyis ade kyi rnam ba bsam ngan byas
de nas spu 'a rgya pa po klu ga chen pos/ bcos ldan 'a dag la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhusal/ mi dang lha ston ba kha lo sgyur// lha dang/ nus pa la gu 'di'i 'dren pa ste/
la ltar bde gshegs bdag 'khrungs dran ldan pa/// nga med byang chub thob pa bdagagis 'u/ 9badran pa thub pas 'dir na srid las rgyal// ngaltar ngun ldan bde gshegs pa des du las
'khrungs// bdud na rmongs mdzad mya ngan 'das rig pa// rgyal pa gang gras mchog gis ba'i lung bstan// dran pa nye bar gzhag la dran bsdusan/ dug lo dra ba'i 'brog
'gagasangar 'gyur// skye bo ma la gang la rtagasagyur pa// yid la rab tu meshes sdug bsngal reg/ na pa mas pa 'khor ba de dang der// me khas 'khol sdug bsngal rjes
su dran// rmongs pa de ni thar pa'i 'grokeshis// nyon mongs bdud kyi spyod yul du 'dag// gang rnam par nyams pa'i yid kyis spyi [” ] dung sdug bsngal bade
yi ba dang// bdag med bdag dang 'gatsang gtsang 'dzin pa// nyon mongs bdud kyi yul las kyi 'gro'i// dag nyams de dag gis ni 'gro ba shis/ pa nyer gog lam na'am/
ba tushag/ spyad pa spyod tsho'agro la phan pa'i phyir// byang chub byed pa'i dran pa nye bar ga ta ka dran l nye pas rtag pa klus thos nas/ 'u chub/ gal du med la 'dun pa bskyed//
klu chen zla bas sa 'dul kha'osgyur// dran pa nye bar gzhag pas rgyal la bstod// dran pa nyams par n tshul 'don pa las// dran stobs nga[y]tu gnas al phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub
gzhal du med la 'dun pa bskyed// ngan pa nyams pa med pa 'gro ba bstan/ byang chub ga zha du med na dun pau0f8bskyod/ byang chub dran ldan gnas la reg par bgyi// bdud stobs
